entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
